name: ERC20 CCIP Bridgeable
description: Extension of ERC20 that allows for bridging the token over the Chainlink CCIP infra.

functionDecorators.name: Bridge
functionDecorators.description: Bridges some amount of tokens to the given blockchain network using the Chainlink CCIP stack.

parameterDecorators.name: Chain ID
parameterDecorators.description: Chain ID of the destination chain to which the tokens are being sent to.

returnDecorators.name: Message ID
returnDecorators.description: Message ID of the message generated by the CCIP in attempt to send a cross chain transaction and bridge tokens.

functionDecorators.name: Get bridge fee
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the bridge fee. This is the amount of native coin required to be sent with the transaction when calling bridge function.

parameterDecorators.name: Wallet
parameterDecorators.description: Wallet address for which the bridge action fee is being calculated

parameterDecorators.name: Chain ID
parameterDecorators.description: Chain ID of the destination chain to which the tokens are being sent to.

returnDecorators.name: Bridge fee
returnDecorators.description: Fee amount required to be sent when calling the bridge transaction.
